Public MustInherit Class ChannelFactory Inherits CommunicationObject Implements IChannelFactory, IDisposable
public ref class ChannelFactory abstract : System::ServiceModel::Channels::CommunicationObject, IDisposable, System::ServiceModel::Channels::IChannelFactory
type ChannelFactory = class inherit CommunicationObject interface IChannelFactory interface ICommunicationObject interface IDisposable

summary.span: 建立和管理由用戶端用於傳送訊息至服務端點的通道。

span.span: Creates and manages the channels that are used by clients to send messages to service endpoints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 負責實作 介面和其相關通道的通道處理站，通常會由通訊模式的初始端所使用。Channel factories that implement the interface and their associated channels are generally used by the initiators of a communication pattern. 負責實作 介面和其相關接聽程式的接聽程式處理站會提供機制，搭配此機制便可接受用於通訊的通道。Listener factories that implement the interface and their associated listeners provide the mechanisms with which channels are accepted for communications. 這個類別不是通道模型的一部分，而是服務模型的一部分。This class is not part of the channel model, but of the service model. 方法會提供建立服務端點之 的方法。The method provides the means to create an for a service endpoint. 請使用它來建構不需使用中繼資料或原則便可連結至服務上介面合約的用戶端。Use it to construct a client that hooks up to an interface contract on the service without using metadata or policy. > [!NOTE] > 不論模擬等級為何，將 `ChannelFactory.Credentials.Windows.AllowedImpersonationLevel` 設定為 `TokenImpersonationLevel.Anonymous` 永遠都會造成匿名登入。Setting `ChannelFactory.Credentials.Windows.AllowedImpersonationLevel` to `TokenImpersonationLevel.Anonymous` always results in an anonymous logon regardless of impersonation level. 給衍生自此類別之 Managed C++ 使用者的特別說明：Special note for Managed C++ users deriving from this class: - 請將您的清除程式碼置於 (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort)，而不是解構函式。Put your cleanup code in (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort), not in a destructor. - 避免使用解構函式，因為它們會導致編譯器自動產生 。Avoid destructors; they cause the compiler to auto-generate . - 避免使用非參考成員，因為它們會導致編譯器自動產生 。Avoid non-reference members; they can cause the compiler to auto-generate . - 避免使用完成項，但如果您要加入完成項，則應隱藏建置警告並從 (On)(Begin)Close (和/或 OnAbort) 呼叫 和完成項本身，以模擬原本可能自動產生的 行為。Avoid using a finalizer; but if you include one, you should suppress the build warning and call and the finalizer itself from (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort) to emulate what would have been the auto-generated behavior. 以程式設計的方式加入行為時，行為會加入至 `Behaviors` 上的適當 屬性，再建立任何通道。When adding behaviors programmatically, the behavior is added to the appropriate `Behaviors` property on the prior to the creation of any channel. 如需程式碼範例，請參閱「範例」一節。See the example section for a code sample. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何以程式設計的方式插入用戶端行為，再由處理站建立通道物件。The following code example shows how to insert programmatically a client behavior prior to the creation of the channel object by the factory. [!code-csharp[ChannelFactoryBehaviors#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/channelfactorybehaviors/cs/client.cs#10)] [!code-vb[ChannelFactoryBehaviors#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/channelfactorybehaviors/vb/client.vb#10)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void ApplyConfiguration(string configurationName) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub ApplyConfiguration (configurationName As String)
abstract member ApplyConfiguration : string -> unit override this.ApplyConfiguration : string -> unit

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: The name of the configuration file.

summary.span: 使用指定組態檔所提供的行為以及通道處理站之服務端點中的行為，初始化通道處理站。

span.span: Initializes the channel factory with the behaviors provided by a specified configuration file and with those in the service endpoint of the channel factory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `configurationName` 為 `null`，則只會載入服務端點中的指定行為。If `configurationName` is `null`, only the behaviors specified in the service endpoint are loaded. 如果使用萬用字元 "\*"，便會使用用戶端組態檔中的任何端點組態，不過只在確實有一個端點時才這樣做。If the wildcard, "\*", is used, any endpoint configuration in the client configuration file is used, but only if there is precisely one. 否則，會擲回例外狀況。Otherwise an exception is thrown. 任何 `configurationName` 的其他值 (包括空字串 "") 都會符合具有相同名稱的端點組態。Any other value for the `configurationName`, including the empty string "", matches the endpoint configuration with the same name. 請參閱[WCF 用戶端組態](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/client-configuration.md)用戶端設定的討論的主題。See the [WCF Client Configuration](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/client-configuration.md) topic for a discussion of the client configuration.

exception.span: 通道處理站的服務端點為 。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Credentials As ClientCredentials

summary.span: 取得認證，用戶端會在處理站產生的通道上使用該認證與服務端點通訊。

span.span: Gets the credentials used by clients to communicate a service endpoint over the channels produced by the factory.

value.span: 如果用戶端認證已針對處理站完成設定，或者如果端點是非 而且通訊狀態為已建立或開啟中，則為用戶端使用的 ，否則為 。

span.span: The used by clients if they are configured for the factory or if the endpoint is non- and is in either the created or opening communication state; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會儲存為端點行為的型別，而且可透過 屬性存取。The object is stored as a type of endpoint behavior and can be accessed through the property. 方法會初始化該處理站之 物件的唯讀複本。The method initializes a read-only copy of the object for the factory. 物件會由 類別 (或衍生自這個類別的類別) 用來建立可以呼叫服務的 Proxy 物件。The object is used by the class (or a class that derives from this class) to create the proxy objects that can call services. 物件也可以透過 屬性來存取。The object is also accessible through the property. > [!NOTE] > 不論模擬等級為何，將 `ChannelFactory.Credentials.Windows.AllowedImpersonationLevel` 設定為 `TokenImpersonationLevel.Anonymous` 永遠都會造成匿名登入。Setting `ChannelFactory.Credentials.Windows.AllowedImpersonationLevel` to `TokenImpersonationLevel.Anonymous` always results in an anonymous logon regardless of impersonation level.

span.span: The default that specifies how long the close operation has to complete before timing out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 和 都是 `null`，便會取得預設的服務模型關閉等候逾時。Gets the default service model close time-out if both the and are `null`. 服務模型關閉等候逾時的預設值為 1 分鐘。The default value for the service model close time-out is 1 minute. 否則，此值會設定為與 有關聯的 值。Otherwise, the value is set to the value associated with the .

MemberSignature.Value: public T GetProperty<T> () where T : class;
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance !!T GetProperty<class T>() cil managed
Public Function GetProperty(Of T As Class) () As T
abstract member GetProperty : unit -> 'T (requires 'T : null) override this.GetProperty : unit -> 'T (requires 'T : null)

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 此方法正在查詢的型別物件。

span.span: The typed object for which the method is querying.

summary.span: 從通道堆疊的適當層次傳回要求的型別物件 (如果存在的話)，如果不存在則為 。

span.span: Returns the typed object requested, if present, from the appropriate layer in the channel stack, or if not present.

returns.span: 要求的型別物件 (如果存在的話)，如果不存在則為 。

span.span: The typed object requested if it is present or if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個物件，即可從通道堆疊擷取功能、需求和參數。Use this to retrieve capabilities, requirements and parameters from the channel stack. 如果通道處理站支援傳回所要求的物件，它便會傳回該物件。If a channel factory supports returning the requested object, it returns it. 如果不是，則會將呼叫向下委派到堆疊中的下一層。If not, it delegates the call down to the next level in the stack. 如果到達堆疊的底部，而且沒有任何通道處理站支援要求的物件，則該方法會傳回 `null`。If it gets to the bottom of the stack and no channel factory supported the requested object, then the method returns `null`. `T` 通常是通道處理站可以支援的某種通道介面。`T` is typically some channel interface that the channel factory can support. 例如，在雙工通道處理站上呼叫 `GetProperty` 時，便會傳回基礎接聽程式。If, for example, `GetProperty` is called on a duplex channel factory, it returns the underlying listener.

summary.span: 初始化通道處理站的服務端點。

span.span: Initializes the service endpoint of the channel factory.

summary.span: 終止目前通道處理站的內部通道處理站。

span.span: Terminates the inner channel factory of the current channel factory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已叫用 方法， 方法便會在其轉換成關閉狀態之後自處理站上呼叫。The method is called on a factory after it transitions to the closing state if the method is invoked.

summary.span: 開啟在目前通道處理站 (具有與其相關聯的狀態物件) 之內部通道處理站上的非同步關閉作業。

returns.span: ，這個項目會參考非同步作業。

span.span: The that references the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會透過回呼 (Callback)，接收有關作業之事件處理常式身分識別的通知。This method receives notification, through a callback, of the identity of the event handler for the operation. 在內部通道處理站上的非同步關閉傳回或逾時發生之前，此作業都不會完成。The operation is not complete until either the asynchronous close on the inner channel factory returns or the time-out occurs.
